messages.message:
For some reason, I cannot edit the GTM Chatbot- Can someone help?

https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/50d0ba9d-841f-4838-906d-a3e2db6c2921

Could you try disabling the _Enable new chatbot flow_ internal preview feature flag (Settings > Account > Internal preview features). This new chatbot creation flow (draft vs published state and no longer created from conversations) is scheduled to go live in 25.30 but if you’re seeing it on prod I’d guess that it’s enabled and might be blocking you.

You _might_ also be able to just work with the new flow — if you click the Draft pill in the top right I think you should be prompted to migrate your existing chatbot to create a draft, then from there you can edit when you have the Draft pill selected.

I’ll also cc @margaret.tomaszczuk as she’s overseeing the launch, in case she has more useful input.
Yes, @Corey Brubaker, can you try clicking "draft"?

Hmmm when I click draft, it says this

Only chatbots in the same organization can be used to create a draft chatbot.
is this a commercial chatbot, Corey?
Oh! now I can edit it- not sure what happened or why- I'll see if it happens again and flag it
